code: export function getCookie(cookieName){var name=cookieName+"=";var decodedCookie=decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);var cookieArray=decodedCookie.split(";");for(var i=0;i<cookieArray.length;i++){var cookie=cookieArray[i];while(cookie.charAt(0)===" "){cookie=cookie.substring(1);}if(cookie.indexOf(name)===0){return cookie.substring(name.length,cookie.length);}}return null;}
